sentences.text: Let me tell you a story...
A long time ago, five prophets, protectors of the land...
...began a quest to bring prosperity to their peoples.
The journey was harsh, the land unforgiving...
...but the power of the prophets surpassed any challenge.
Along the way, the prophets made many friends and allies.
One of these friends, a young hermit...
...led them through lands unfamiliar to the prophets.
With the help of their new friend...
...the prophets found the artifact they were looking for.
The prophets decided to celebrate their success after a long journey.
Their new friend had other plans, however.
With the artifact missing, the land grew cold and barren
Populations depleted, temples fell to ruin
What was once a prosperous land now harbors little life
That, however, was a long time ago.
